title: Rose Milk
description: A fragrant and refreshing floral sip that's a cooling oasis on a sunny day.
steps: Warm the milk in a saucepan over low heat.
Add the rose syrup and sugar, and stir until well combined.
If using saffron, crush it and add to the milk mixture.
Stir until the milk is heated through and the flavors are well blended.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Milk tea
description: Steaming comfort in a cup, where every brew tells a tale of warmth and relaxation.
ingredients: 1 tea bag or 1 teaspoon loose tea leaves
steps: Place the tea bag or tea leaves in a cup.
Pour boiling water over the tea and steep for 2-5 minutes (adjust steeping time based on preference).
Add sugar and milk if desired. Stir well.
Remove the tea bag or strain the tea if using loose leaves.
Enjoy your tea!

title: Badam Milk
description: Creamy and nutty, this almond-infused elixir is a sweet indulgence for the senses.
steps: Soak almonds in hot water for a few hours or overnight, then peel and make a paste.
Heat the milk in a saucepan over medium heat.
Add almond paste, sugar, and saffron strands if using.
Stir continuously until the mixture is well blended and heated through.
Serve hot or cold.

title: Coffee
description: Bold, aromatic, and the perfect companion for those seeking a daily dose of awakening.
steps: Add instant coffee powder to a cup.
Pour hot water over the coffee and stir until dissolved.
Add sugar and milk if desired. Stir well.
Enjoy your coffee!

title: Masala Chai
description: An aromatic blend of spices and tea leaves, this chai is a flavorful journey for your taste buds.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons loose tea leaves or 2 tea bags
Spices: 2-3 cloves, 2-3 cardamom pods, 1 small piece of cinnamon
steps: Crush the spices (cloves, cardamom, and cinnamon) lightly.
Boil water in a saucepan and add the crushed spices.
Add tea leaves or tea bags and simmer for a few minutes.
Add milk and sugar, and simmer until the chai is heated through.
Strain and serve hot.

title: Cappuccino
description: A frothy masterpiece that marries espresso, steamed milk, and velvety foam for a coffee lover's dream.
steps: Brew a shot of espresso using an espresso machine.
Steam the milk until it's hot but not boiling.
Froth the milk to create foam.
Pour the espresso into a cup.
Add the steamed milk to the cup.
Top it with the foamed milk.
Dust with cocoa powder and cinnamon powder if desired.
Serve hot and enjoy!
